parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Render Time Scope

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Converts position from object model space to world space in render time.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> obj '''modelToWorldVisualWorld''' modelPos
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> obj: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> modelPos: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - World position in format [[PositionASL]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[modelToWorldVisualWorld]] [0,1,0]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[modelToWorldWorld]], [[modelToWorldVisual]], [[getPosWorldVisual]]
</value></part></template>


<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 28, 2017 - 22:19 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command produces identical result to [[modelToWorldVisual]] command used in conjunction with [[AGLToASL]]
<code>obj [[modelToWorldVisualWorld]] [1,2,3] [[isEqualTo]] [[AGLToASL]] (obj [[modelToWorldVisual]] [1,2,3]); // true</code>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
